text: Dave Cullen is an American journalist and non-fiction writer. ==Life== Cullen graduated from the University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign. His work has appeared in The Daily Beast and Vanity Fair. == Works == * Columbine, New York : Twelve, 2009. , *Parkland: Birth of a Movement, New York, New York : Harper Collins Publishers, 2019. , ==References== ==External links== * *"Dave Cullen, Author of “Parkland: Birth of a Movement”, Amanpour & Co. 02.14.2019 *“Columbine” and “Parkland” Author Dave Cullen: Data on mass murder shouldn’t exist, WGN, February 21, 2019. title: Dave Cullen
